name: Terraform on Naver Cloud Open Source Contribution
description: I made contributes such as typo correction and resource conversion to the terraform provider open source. It was an opportunity to get used to Cloud, Iac.

name: App KnowSnap
description:
Application for easy and convenient review of learned knowledge (IT knowledge, algorithm problems, etc.) from anywhere.
I created an app using Flutter, Spring and AWS

name: Children's Shopping Platform BO
description:
I participated in the production of backoffice for the ZaeZae Children's Complex Shopping Platform conducted by startup GeeksLoft.
     I was in charge of the BO front using React and made a backend api with Django and postgresql.

name: Children's Shopping Platform App
description:
I participated in the production of the app for the ZaeZae Children's Complex Shopping Platform conducted by startup GeeksLoft.
    I was in charge of making apps using platters, and I made backend api with Django and postgresql.

name: App Bogeo
description:
Application that aims to prevent misuse of medicines through medication management and drug identification functions.
I created an app using Flutter and collaborated with spring and ml.

name: App Gamehaeduo
description: Application that brings together countless people looking for a game duo and makes it easy to find them. It helps to discover value between people in the growing game industry.

description: Applications for reducing carbon footprints by exchanging food waste into sustainable resources.

name: App Blueming Idea
description: Applications for increasing the efficiency of mental illness prevention, diagnosis, treatment, and post-management through emotional diary writing, a type of cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT).

name: Self-Driving Logistics Robot, Tail
